title: Triple sword
data:
{{version031}} {{weapon |name = Triple sword |cost = ? |weight = 26.0 |skill = Long Blades |damage = 19 |accuracy = -4 |basedelay = 18 (180%) |mindelay = 7 at skill 22 |hands = 2H |size = Large |damtype = Slicing |ranged = No |acquirement = 2 }} {{flavour|A formidable weapon created by a master craftsman. The blade of the sword forks into three great razor-sharp edges. ---- "Quemadmodum gladius neminem occidit: occidentus telum est."
"A sword by itself does not slay; it is merely the weapon used by the slayer." -Lucius Annaeus Seneca, _Epistulae Morales ad Lucilium_, Letter LXXXVII: Some arguments in favor of the simple life, l. 30. ca. 65 A.D.
trans. Richard Mott Gummere, 1917.}} {{crawlquote|This weapon falls into the '[[Long Blades]]' category. It is a two handed weapon.}} '''Triple swords''' are the most powerful [[Long Blades]] in the game. While they are extremely rare and require considerable skill to use effectively, they are nonetheless excellent for slicing through enemies of all sorts. Of the melee weapons that [[human]]s can use, triple swords deal the most damage. [[Giant club]]s and [[giant spiked club]]s are more powerful, but only [[Troll]]s, [[Ogre]]s, and [[Formicid]]s can wield those. As a [[Long Blades|Long Blade]], it scales with [[Dexterity]] rather than [[Strength]]. {| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:auto; padding:0; text-align: center" ! || Image |- | '''Mundane''' || [[File:Triple sword.png]] |- | '''Magical''' || [[File:Triple sword2.png]] |- | '''Artifact''' || [[File:Triple sword3.png]] |- | '''[[Plutonium Sword]]''' || [[File:plutonium sword.png]] |} ==History== *In [[0.28]], triple swords lost riposte, gaining back pre-riposte damage levels. Their base delay was also reduced to 1.8 (from 1.9). *In [[0.19]], Long Blades gained riposte. Triple swords were reduced by 2 base damage to compensate. *In [[0.16]], [[claymore]]s were renamed back to triple swords. *In [[0.14]], triple swords were renamed to [[claymore]]s. {{weapons}}
